segments.text: I notice the contrast between the tidy garden outside and the disorder inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful view makes the chaos in the kitchen stand out so starkly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like the children are living in a world of their own, unaware of the stakes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s climbing antics remind me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire their bravery, but it also frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like time is standing still as I wait for something to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will the woman notice before it’s too late? I highly doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
